Name: Dank Subs
About the game: Hi Chat! This game is still in progress! I'll keep building on it! GAME MODES: Single Player This game mode is a 'Souls-Like' adventure! Hack, slash, and dodge your way through enemies while collecting Subs! Multiplayer Find the Bernie: This is a multiplayer game where you race on foot against others to reach the level end ! The level end is marked by a floating orb with a Bernie Sanders cardboard cut-out. More Multiplayer Game Modes Coming Soon! GAMEPLAY FEATURES: SPRINTING AND ROLLING You can Jump over objects and on platforms. Sprint and Roll/Air Dash to beat your competition and avoid AI Enemies! COMBAT While other PvP players can do a small amount of damage to you, most combat will be from enemy AI. The enemies can STUN-LOCK you and deal serious damage. Players can pick up Swords and Shields . Players can Quick Attack with left mouse/R1 and Heavy Attack with right mouse/R2 Block with 'V'/'L1' Target nearest enemy with 'TAB'/'R3' Rolling when you have enemy Targeted will dodge the enemy in the direction you are moving. STAMINA: Sprinting , Rolling , Blocking , and Attacking drain your Stamina Bar If stamina is drained, player cannot perform actions listed. CHICKEN TENDIES: Press Interact at chicken tenders or chicken wraps to Restore Health Restoring Health will also RESET ENEMIES that died. So be strategic and other players will have to deal with enemies you Revived! COLLECT SUBS: Defeated enemies will give the player 'subs' in a sub counter in bottom right corner. Subs will unlock more special abilities (coming soon) This is a community game for fans of HasanAbi twitch streamer. I welcome ideas in growing this game! *this is a fan made game for the twitch streamer HasanAbi. Game will remain free forever . All content is stream safe and music is made by me and other Hasan fans
